title: Lucid Dreams - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/13/19
itunes:title: Lucid Dreams - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/13/19
description:
George Noory and dream expert Robert Waggoner discuss the phenomenon of lucid dreaming, where you are aware you are in the middle of a dream and can control its outcome, and how to gain personal insights from the experience.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and dream expert Robert Waggoner discuss the phenomenon of lucid dreaming, where you are aware you are in the middle of a dream and can control its outcome, and how to gain personal insights from the experience.

itunes:summary: An examination of the technique of controlling your dream while you're asleep.
